command_group: az network front-door rules-engine rule condition
description: Manage Rules Engine match conditions for Front Door.

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule condition add
commands.summary: Add a match condition to a Rules Engine rule.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule condition add --front-door-name
                                                      --name
                                                      --resource-group
                                                      --rules-engine-name
                                                      [--match-values]
                                                      [--match-variable {IsMobile, PostArgs, QueryString, RemoteAddr, RequestBody, RequestFilename, RequestFilenameExtension, RequestHeader, RequestMethod, RequestPath, RequestScheme, RequestUri}]
                                                      [--negate-condition {false, true}]
                                                      [--operator {Any, BeginsWith, Contains, EndsWith, Equal, GeoMatch, GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqual, IPMatch, LessThan, LessThanOrEqual}]
                                                      [--selector]
                                                      [--transforms {Lowercase, RemoveNulls, Trim, Uppercase, UrlDecode, UrlEncode}]

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule condition list
commands.summary: Show all match conditions associated with a Rules Engine rule.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule condition list --front-door-name
                                                       --name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       --rules-engine-name

commands.name: az network front-door rules-engine rule condition remove
commands.summary: Remove a match condition from a Rules Engine rule.
commands.syntax:
az network front-door rules-engine rule condition remove --front-door-name
                                                         --index
                                                         --name
                                                         --resource-group
                                                         --rules-engine-name
